structuredData.name: Sign a PDF online
structuredData.description: Workflow for drawing or uploading a signature and placing it on a PDF page.

step.name: Upload the PDF
step.text: Rename the document and drop it into the tool. Files up to 20 MB stay on-device.

step.name: Create or import a signature
step.text: Use the canvas to draw or upload a PNG/JPG version of your signature.

step.name: Choose page and placement
step.text: Select the page plus vertical and horizontal anchors, then adjust the width slider.

step.name: Export the signed PDF
step.text: Click Apply signature and download the updated file for sharing.
